instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3476 no power
threads.message:
Arrived with only minor liquid damage on Q5158. Replaced but no change, Only 0.60V on PPVCC_S0_CPU


What should be checked next?

threads.title: 820-3476 no power
threads.message:
Do you get correct voltage on all other coils?

PPVCC_S0_CPU  starts directly with 0.6V, or drops in seconds from higher start voltage?

threads.title: 820-3476 no power
threads.message:
yes correct voltage on other coils

 PPVCC_S0_CPU starts directly with 0.6V

threads.title: 820-3476 no power
threads.message:
Check diode mode to ground there.
Compare with similar board.

threads.title: 820-3476 no power
threads.message: Compares same to other board not working as well

threads.title: 820-3476 no power
threads.message:
Try heating CPU with quality flux.
May have luck to be only accumulated crap between its balls.
